name: Boxession
description:
Boxession is a single-screen puzzle game, where the player takes the role of a special box with the ability to possess other boxes like him. The puzzles require the player to navigate the levels by overcoming obstacles like holes, ice floors, lasers and switches. Feel like you are pro enough? Try to complete our Hardcore level and feel like a champ upon completion!

----------
Developed in Unity Engine by a passionate team of three - 1 designer and 2 programmers, who wanted to deliver a unique puzzle experience that is playable on all platforms.

Player Mechanics, Level Designer, UI Designer - Aaron Chu

Gameplay Programming, Level Designer and Tools - Shannon Tan

Visual Design, Gameplay Design, Level Designer - Sean Tan
